      • createXAxis

        public void createXAxis()
        Description copied from class: Tk_Graph

        Create the x-axis by:

        1. Draw the x-axis,
        2. Draw an arrow on the end of the x-axis,
        3. Draw the big and small ticks on the x-axis.

        Overrides:
        createXAxis in class Tk_Graph<T>

      • addBarElement

        public void addBarElement(java.lang.String cat_name,
                 java.lang.String bar_name,
                 long x_origin,
                 long h)
        Add a Tk_BarContainer for category cat_name if there isn't already on in the graph, and add the new Bar with name bar_name to it. The newly added Tk_BarContainer is a container for the graph's bars for the givent category name. Having added the new bar container element to the graph, subsequent calls to this method for the same String cat_name will simply add another bar to the Tk_BarContainer element.
        Parameters:
        cat_name - The name of the category (on the x-axis) where the new bar, and hence the new bar container should appear.
        bar_name - The name of the new bar - for example a task name.
        x_origin - The position of the bottom left corner of the new bar container if one needs to be created.
        h - The height of the graph component, and therefore the height of the bar container, and the maximum height of a bar within that container.
